CustomGroup is the customized Node Group, which supports Circle and Rect type Group. You can create a Node Group by CustomGroup, and set the group style, calculate the groups, and collapse / extend groups.
The instances of CustomGroup will be created while instantiating the Graph. No manual instantiation is required.
to assign the group type and styles respectively when instantiating the Graph.
groupType is a string indicating the type of the Node Group. Options
indicates the styles of the Node Groups in different states, e.g. default state, hover state, and collapse state.
The common propertoes of the groups in the default, hover and collapse states are similar to nodes, which are introduced in
. Besides, the group style in default and collapse states have some special properties below:
The padding of the Groups without nested structure
No nested Group is the Group containing no other Groups
Tha padding of the Groups with nested structure
Nested Group is the Group containing other Groups
, where the group1 is the Group without nested structure, and the group2 is a nested Group.
, where the group1 is the Group without nested structure, and the group2 is a nested Group.
The radius of the circle Group

The height of the rect Group

The array of node objects or ids
The title text or the configurations

Hide the nodes and the edges when the Group is collapsed. The edges linked to the inner nodes will link to the group;
The nodes and the edges will be restored when the Group is expand.
